name: Brine for Smoked Salmon
author: Mike O.
summary: Salmon brine is made with lots of citrus flavor. It is also excellent for trout. This recipe makes enough to brine two large salmon fillets.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package dry crab and shrimp seasoning mix
freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 cloves garlic, crushed or to taste
directions: Pour the water into a large bowl or small bucket
If you must use a pot, use one that does not contain aluminum
Stir in the kosher salt, white sugar, brown sugar, lemon pepper, parsley and seasoning mix
Add the garlic, hot pepper sauce, lemons, oranges, lime and onion
Soak your salmon in this brine in the refrigerator for 12 to 36 hours
Smoke using your desired method (see Cook's Note)
